qas.question: Which film did Kathleen Kennedy first work with Spielberg on?
Which childhood friend worked on Spielberg's films?
Which film did Kaminski first work with Spielberg on?
Which film did Daviau first work with Spielberg on?
Which film did Kahn first work with Spielberg on?
What was the first movie Kathleen Kennedy produced?
What movie did Allen Daviau first work on as a cinematographer?
What was the first movie Janusz Kaminski ever shot?
What was the first film Michael Kahn ever edited?
For what movie did Laurent Bouzereau complete his first documentary?

context: Spielberg prefers working with production members with whom he has developed an existing working relationship. An example of this is his production relationship with Kathleen Kennedy who has served as producer on all his major films from <a0_0><b5_0>E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial<b5_0/><a0_0/> to the recent Lincoln. For cinematography, <a1_0>Allen Daviau<a1_0/>, a childhood friend and cinematographer, shot the early Spielberg film <a3_0><b6_0>Amblin<b6_0/><a3_0/> and most of his films up to Empire of the Sun; Janusz Kamiński who has shot every Spielberg film since <a2_0><b7_0><b9_0>Schindler's List<b9_0/><b7_0/><a2_0/> (see List of film director and cinematographer collaborations); and the film editor Michael Kahn who has edited every film directed by Spielberg from <a4_0><b8_0>Close Encounters<b8_0/><a4_0/> to Munich (except E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial). Most of the DVDs of Spielberg's films have documentaries by Laurent Bouzereau.
